sentences.en: But small satellites, including shoebox-sized “cubesats”, are often used in place of the ballast carried by rockets to improve their weight distribution.
sentences.cn: 不过小型卫星（包括鞋盒大小的“立方体卫星”），常用来代替火箭携带的压舱物，以改善其重量分布。

sentences.en: He furnished psychological ballast to a desperate President.
sentences.cn: 他给一位在绝望中挣扎的总统提供了心理镇定剂.

sentences.en: He has got no ballast whatever.
sentences.cn: 他这个人一点也不沉着.
他所受的训练使他变得坚定.

sentences.en: Low harmonics, high power factor, and the ballast with.
sentences.cn: 低谐波 、 高功率因数 、 带有滤波器件的整流器.

sentences.en: Purpose: High voltage switch mode , suitable for electronic ballast application.
sentences.cn: 用途: 主要应用于高压转换, 适用于电子节能灯.

sentences.en: The ballast may be thrown out to make the balloon go higher.
sentences.cn: 沙袋可以抛掉以使气球飞得更高.

sentences.en: The invention provides a low - cost resonance inverter circuit used for a ballast.
sentences.cn: 本发明提供一种用于镇流器的低成本谐振逆变器电路.

sentences.en: The rail beds well on the ballast.
sentences.cn: 铁轨在道碴上搁得很稳.

sentences.en: The rails of the two tracks are supported on wooden ties resting on a ballast.
sentences.cn: 两条线路的钢轨放置在有道碴承托的枕木上.

sentences.en: The ship was furnished with ballast.
Then the sound of rumbling thunder reached the watchers on the shore, as cargo, ballast, ammunition and 400 people went sliding and crashing down to the port side of the steeply listing ship.
sentences.cn: 后来当船上的货物 、 压舱物 、 弹药以及400个人轰的一声滑到急剧倾斜的船体左舷一侧的时候, 岸上观看的人们听到了雷鸣般的轰隆声.

sentences.en: This means that teams with KERS have less ballast to move around the car and hence have less freedom to vary their car’s weight distribution.
sentences.cn: 这就是说使用KERS的车队使用了更少的压舱物来移动赛车，因此有较少的自由来改变他们的车的重量分配。

sentences.en: To ensure ventilation and raise cooling efficiency, please mount the ballast vertically.
sentences.cn: 为了保证机壳内部空气流通,提高散热效率, 请垂直放置镇流器.

sentences.en: To fill ( a railroad bed ) with or as if with ballast.
sentences.cn: 铺沙石用或似用沙石铺 ( 铁路路基 )

sentences.en: Voltage provided to a ballast by a power line or power supply.
sentences.cn: 由电源或输电线输入到包括镇流器的电压.

sentences.en: We can trust that company; the partners are in ballast all right.
sentences.cn: 我们可以信任那家公司, 其合伙人都很可靠.

words.tran_cn: [建][水运]压舱物，[船]压载物；道渣，碎石

phrases.tran_cn: 道床；道碴床；碎石道床；道碴路基
压载舱；潜水艇沉浮箱；压载箱；压舱柜
压载水；压舱水；压舱配重水
电子镇流器；电子安定器

trans.tran_cn: 压舱物，压载物，道渣，碎石，镇流器，<比喻>沉着
trans.tran_en: heavy material that is carried by a ship to make it more steady in the water
